post.body: spotted: rebecca doing something private that she doesn't want twittered but that her roommate twitters anyway. xoxo the roommate
YOU'RE FUCKED! god i love theater
oh you have to enable it. go to settings, then the "Labs" tab, then enable it. It will appear under contacts
gmail actually just integrated its own task manager. RTM is good, but if google has its own, why add another extension?
haha ok. cuz me and @becs1024 were trying to figure out why we were randomly friended by the OTR twitter...how did they find us?
so random question....but are u an otr blogger?
i forgot how much a loved that song...and how epic it was
ya i finally figured it out. i love it
how bored are you right now?
what's your absolute favorite adagio tea?....do you even drink adagio tea still?
i mean, idk what i'd do with a new HP computer....but i'd make use of it
hey, i'll do it. is it just than random giveaway that requires you to have 3 other friends?
ya....now we cant have fun anymore
...do i know you by the way?
physics..also quite possibly the worst class ever
That's Me/The Asian Song is the BEST Commentary: The Musical song, hands down.
@feliciaday Got the Dr. Horrible dvd for xmas! SOOO pumped. cant wait to watch later
unfortunately idk. im not 21 yet, so i cant go to bars. sorry!
trolls are stupid. if you're going to respond, just kill them.
moving into tisch for the day
studying genetics until thursday...like, basically all day everyday. im gonna know SOOO much self-taught science by the end of this
integrated to-do list in gmail....yesss
why doesnt gmail want to integrate my school mail? .....mail-fail?
trying out gmail as my total email center (integrated tufts mail into it)....we'll see if its better to consolidate or separate
zombie...stripper...danceoff...OH MY GOD
im still in dt....its currently 1:37 am...oof
building set models makes me feel all artsy and manly at the same time. pathetic much?
officially done with eli siegel....thank god
whatup genetics? studying all day...i AM excited for @feliciday 's post about the Dr. Horrible dvd...must get for chrismahannukwanzika
whoa my bank account just plummeted....oof
now up to Eaton to conquer some old genetics exam. this should be interesting
physics exam was a shitshow. fimally getting my computer back today tho!
robert guertin is not only the worst professor at tufts but also quite possibly the worst human being alive
berfday!
why do i get delayed hangovers?! i woke up hours ago but i feel like shit now!
my computer just completely spazzed. it froze twice yesterday, once today, and the keyboard stopped working for about 20 mins...wtf?
http://twitpic.com/wj06 - xmas WIN
gah...gotta wait another hour....wtf
waiting for my siblings to return from their father's house so i can open presents...I WANT PRESENTS!!!!
merry christmas!
my stepdad is getting really annoyed with verizon. pushing him towards att so i can get an iphone...in like 2 years
food shopping, gift buying, family getting annoyed with each other...it must be christmas time
on the train tomorrow, do i watch High Fidelity, Diggnation, Romy and Michelle's High School Reunion, or Newsies?
channukah and winter solstice on the same day? it must be a sign. the messiah arrives perhaps?...but wait, im already here
erm....i might die on the way home from work. it basically looks like the apocalypse is here. at least the drive will be engaging?
wtf fire alarm at work?! grrr. its col out!
im watching legally blonde the musical.....i kinda hate myself
....bored in the lab. cant dance around and play music because my coworker is here. lame....
i somehow got to work on time despite treacherous road conditions. strange
its 8 am.....waiting for the T....im FREEZING
attempting to go to bed early....working in the morning if the roads arent treacherous. i need dinero like whoa.
ahh! just ate a whole apple and now my gums are swelling up like mad...guess i am still alergic
